long_description: Ready for your next outing to the beach or concert in the park, the REI Personal Ice Box is spacious enough to hold a picnic for two and will keep it fresh until you're ready to enjoy it. Webbing handle and a detachable shoulder strap with an adjustable pad make it easy to carry. Closed-cell foam provides efficient insulation to keep food and beverages cool for hours. Heavy-duty PEVA liner is waterproof, PVC-free and easy to wipe clean. A stretch pocket on each end is handy for stashing bottles. The REI Personal Ice Box has an outer zip pocket for utensils and napkins.
short_description: Ready for your next outing to the beach or concert in the park, the REI Personal Ice Box is spacious enough to hold a picnic for two and will keep it fresh until you're ready to enjoy it.
